price: 85. Mpe tokelaki likolo na nsé, na maye manso mazuami o kati na yango mibale te sé na bosóló, mpe ya soló, ngonga ekokokaka, limbisa bolimbisi bwa malamu.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun fa-iṣ'faḥi al-ṣafḥa al-jamīla
